thread.title: City Snapshot: Rising number of suppliers on the bread line thanks to supermarket price war
thread.title_full: City Snapshot: Rising number of suppliers on the bread line thanks to supermarket price war

title: City Snapshot: Rising number of suppliers on the bread line thanks to supermarket price war
text:
20 Jul 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
The battle between the UK’s biggest supermarkets has led to a 54% jump in the number of food suppliers in “significant” financial distress Available to members only
